{"id":571842492,"lang":"cpp","time":"10Â months, 2Â weeks","timestamp":1634339095,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/571842492/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Happy Number","memory":"6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int getnext(int n){\n        int sum =0;\n        while(n>0){\n           int r = n%10;\n            sum += (r*r);\n            n = n/10;\n        }\n        return sum;\n    }\n    bool isHappy(int n) {\n        int slow = n;\n        int fast = getnext(n);\n        while(fast !=1 && slow !=fast){\n            slow = getnext(slow);\n            fast = getnext(getnext(fast));\n        }\n        return fast ==1 ;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"happy-number"}
